skills.name: Yin Yang Attack
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with the power of Yin and Yang and puts the enemy to sleep for 2 turns with a 20% chance. The damage increases according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.multiplier_formula: 3.6*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.09*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: North Star's Wisdom
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times with each attack having a 75% chance to remove a beneficial effect of the enemy and a 75% chance to block the beneficial effects granted on the target for 2 turns. This attack won't land as Glancing Hits.

skill_effect.name: Beneficial Effects Blocked
skill_effect.description: Buffs cannot be applied to the monster

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Sleeve Attack
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with world devouring powers and removes the beneficial effects on all enemies. You recover 5% HP for every enemy beneficial effect removed.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill
